jump_scares.spoiler: There is a loud sound effect as we see a body hanging from the ceiling (the sound effect is more startling than anything we see on screen)
Several rats jump in front of Clare as she crawls under the house (once again there is a loud sound effect)
Accompanied by a sound effect, there is a sudden cut to Clare’s uncle struggling in the bath
A loud thunder clap may startle some viewers
Clare sees a hooded figure taking a picture of her from outside her bedroom
There is a loud bang as a cracker is let off at the bonfire
There is a loud bang as Clare’s dad’s car tire blows out
The lift makes a loud mechanical screech
The lift suddenly starts to fall as Meredith goes to leave
Several images of the earlier deaths flash across the screen
